Guardian's Might.name: Guardian's Might
Guardian's Might.fullText:
Iron Guardian Attack 11Guardian's Might

Your weapon fuses with you for a moment as you crash into your enemy and knock it down.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. You then shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Augment 2

Target: One or two creatures


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 59.
Guardian's Might.flavor: Your weapon fuses with you for a moment as you crash into your enemy and knock it down.
Guardian's Might.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. You then shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.
Guardian's Might.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Aspect of the Iron Guardian.name: Aspect of the Iron Guardian
Aspect of the Iron Guardian.fullText:
Iron Guardian Attack 20Aspect of the Iron Guardian

You transform into a creature of iron, scattering foes and crushing those foolish enough to resist your advance.

Daily        Polymorph, Psionic, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each enemy you can see in the burst

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You assume the aspect of the iron guardian until the end of the encounter. While in this aspect, you can use the following augmentation with your battlemind at-will attack powers that are augmentable. This augmentation is in addition to the effects that an at-will power might have; this augmentation doesnâ€™t supersede them.

Augment 1

Effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, and any enemy adjacent to you that falls prone or starts its turn prone takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 59.
Aspect of the Iron Guardian.flavor: You transform into a creature of iron, scattering foes and crushing those foolish enough to resist your advance.
Aspect of the Iron Guardian.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Aspect of the Iron Guardian.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Aspect of the Iron Guardian.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, and any enemy adjacent to you that falls prone or starts its turn prone takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier. In addition, choose a single creature hit by the at-will attack. That creature takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Iron Defense.name: Iron Defense
Iron Defense.fullText:
Iron Guardian Utility 12Iron Defense

Your skin becomes as hard as iron, allowing you to shrug off even the deadliest blows.

At-Will        Psionic
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, roll a d20 whenever you take damage. On a 10 or higher, the damage is reduced to 0. Otherwise, the damage is halved.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 59.
Iron Defense.flavor: Your skin becomes as hard as iron, allowing you to shrug off even the deadliest blows.
Iron Defense.effect: Until the end of your next turn, roll a d20 whenever you take damage. On a 10 or higher, the damage is reduced to 0. Otherwise, the damage is halved.
